header: Saving bookmarks is a pain. Mojave is a browser extension that makes it easy.

text: Everyone thinks their way of saving bookmarks is the right way.  As a designer and visual person, I wanted to see all of my bookmarks on the page at once. Tools like Pinboard, Pocket, Delicious, and others don't support this.

And I wanted to be able to save them as quickly as possible. After a long search to find a tool that suited me, I decided to make build one myself. To date, there have been tens of thousands of bookmarks saved. Below are still frames from an instructional video I created for the launch.
2023 Update: While Mojave was a popular product, it wasn't a great business. Because of that we shut it down last year.
